title_short: (05240) Navalperal de Pinares - 48 Avenida de Julio Arenillas
description: Spanish municipalities, take an example! Small, pretty and fully equipped camper area, a real jewel overlooking a splendid hilly landscape. Arriving on the road, you will find horses, cows, goats and sheep almost everywhere! The area has well-done loading and unloading (50 cents for 150 liters of water and 20 cents for unloading the toilet), separate waste collection, column for four electrical connections (payment by card, contactless, of 2 euros for 24 hours of supply ), free access to municipal wifi and video surveillance! The stalls are slightly sloping, which can be solved with wedges. The village is certainly worth a visit, there is also a train station nearby, if you want to move around Madrid, from here it is very simple and safe for your vehicle. Only applause!

Many trails with impressive landscapes, to be able to walk and enjoy nature.

description: Family-friendly campsite ... very quiet, wide recreational meadows, hiking trails, with a large pool included and close to a swimming area in the natural gorge

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - 1 Diseminado Camino Agua Riaza
description: Prairie of San Isidro, meadow with small trees and small shadows, is usually quiet but can coincide with some celebration, since there are swings, barbecue area and fountains. Discard coming in the week of San Isidro (May 15) there is a fair all week and it is impossible to park

title: (05113) Burgohondo - 3 Calle del Rio
description: Recreation area next to the river Alberche in a very quiet village Burgohondo, surrounded by nature, there is a spring next to some old barbecues fallen into disuse, in summer it is a popular swimming area it there will be a lot of people.

title: (05113) Ávila - 158 Calle Poligono 025
description: Parking next to the river surrounded by grass, super quiet and beautiful. Although they put up signs prohibiting dogs, people here bring them with no problem, next door there is a sandy beach for them too. Public toilets, containers, some bars nearby.

title: (28210) Valdemorillo - 6 Camino Robledo de Chavela
description: Parking next to the bullring

title: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - M-505
title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - M-505
description: Parking adjacent to the climb to the throne of FelipeII. Isolated Quiet. Nature. There is a road leading to the monastery.

title: (05450) Casavieja - 3 Conjunto S1/ Cm Campo de Futbol
title_short: (05450) Casavieja - 3 Conjunto S1/ Cm Campo de Futbol
description: Large esplanade of land and grass with some gravel on the outskirts of the town, with hardly any car traffic, there is a fountain with a screw tap but it says that until further notice it is out of service

address.street: 3 Conjunto S1/ Cm Campo de Futbol

title: (05120) Navalmoral - AV-900
description: Great spot overlooking the mountains. Fresh water in the Ermita area

title: (05120) Navalmoral - AV-900
description: Superb place, rare and to be preserved. There is a practicable dirt road to find an area that does not bother anyone.

title: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 120 Paseo Carlos III
title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 120 Paseo Carlos III
description: Level parking. Next to the prince's house. Capacity for about 10 vehicles. 10 minutes from the monastery walking. It is next to the road but generally quiet. Fountain and garbage containers 500 meters towards the town, in a recreational area that is on the right hand side.

title: (45515) Maqueda - 50 Carretera Ávila
description: Road very accessible land that leads to an abandoned house, some waste but very quiet, there is room. The spot is surrounded by fields. Attention, we went on a Sunday and we heard shots so hunters nearby

title: () San Lorenzo de El Escorial -
description: Very quiet place to spend the night, right next to the Bosque de la Herrería, with tables to eat and paths to walk around. 10 minutes from San Lorenzo de El Escorial. Yes, there is a certain slope.

title: (05239) Peguerinos - Calle Villa
description: Parking in front of the lake in the middle of nature, an inhabitant of the closest town, Peguerinos, told me. Very quiet place. There are 2 "parkings" when you follow the path, both the same.

title: (45515) Maqueda - 32 Carretera Ávila
description: At the entrance of Maqueda, towards Avila. Pretty town with church and castle very interesting. Vegetable shop, bars. Very nice people.

title: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 12 Pasaje Carlos III
title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 12 Pasaje Carlos III
description: Parking very close to the monastery of San Lorenzo. We spent two days in May and we were able to park and sleep without problems. During the day, the car park is full, but in the evening we are alone. Totally recommended to visit the city, hiking routes and bike rides ..

title: (45515) Maqueda - 2 Calle de la
description: Park with a picnic table and benches, very comfortable and quiet. Next to the Caliphal Gate. Surrounded by parking. Easy access for motorhomes. Right in front of the town hall.

title: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - Calle Calleja Larga
title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - Calle Calleja Larga
description:
Area of large meadows with plenty of space to park.
go to the end of the road where you will find a barrier that cuts it off.
Just behind the Escorial monastery.
during the day there are cars but at night it is empty and very quiet.

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - 4 Calle de los Siete Picos
title_short: (28600) Navalcarnero - 4 Calle de los Siete Picos
description: Normal parking, isolated from noise and good views, with almost no traffic and with houses nearby. We feel safe and cool.

title: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 11 Camino de Peguerinos
title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 11 Camino de Peguerinos
description: Bonito sitio donde pernoctar el silencio y con vistas al monasterio de el escorial noche estupenda como el único ruido de los pájaros ,no hay tránsito de coches y a primera hora de la mañana hay personas paseando por una senda que está al lado

title: (45644) Nuño Gómez - 0 Carretera de Nombela
description: The site is a picnic area, there are three tables with benches, shady, not much because when we were there the trees were still somewhat young, there is a very nice barbecue, freshly made and brand new

title: (45515) Maqueda - 10 Carretera Ávila
description: Picnic area near the castle. It has a couple of tables, swings and a bench. The place is nice although a bit noisy because it is close to the A5. Ample place to park motorhomes, with little incline but not completely flat

title: (05239) Peguerinos -
description: Quiet place in the middle of nature, right in front of the swamp to take a morning dip. The access road is not paved and is two-way, there are several entrances to park. It is important to mention that the road does not surround the entire reservoir and that it is not recommended for very low vehicles.

title: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 20 Avenida Carlos Ruiz
title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 20 Avenida Carlos Ruiz
description: Parking at the exit of the routes to monte abantos, the ground is somewhat uneven but it is quite level and seems quiet

title: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - Calle Calleja Larga
title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - Calle Calleja Larga
description: Free day parking, close to the Monastery. Parking is prohibited from 11pm to 7am. Picnic area further on. Communicating with the Forest of La Herrería, bike rides to the chair of Felipe II and La Casita del Príncipe.

title: (05239) Peguerinos - 49 Peñas Blancas
description: Small parking on the side of the road that gives access to the Peguerinos campsite and the Abantos high. It is next to the road but it is quiet. Helpful and welcoming people. Nice mountain routes in the area.

title: (28691) Villanueva de la Cañada -
description:
Parking in beaten earth, the path to access the place is slightly bumpy.
Great sunset over the mountains

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - 21 Calle de los Cástines
description: Great place to park and rest. It is just a short walk to the historic center. Quiet, spacious, and well-kept parking area. It has a 24 hour gas station right next door. And also a supermarket. Not many cars usually pass by and it allows you to rest well.

name: Camping San Juan
title: (28210) Camping San Juan
description: Camping San Juan in valdemorillo. Located on a hill near the road. Nearby there are swamp and routes. Not many shadows

address.street: 97 Carretera a la Urbanización Pino Alto

title: (05113) Burgohondo - AV-901
description: Very quiet place next to the arch bridge, where you can bathe very comfortably. The parking lot looks recent and is made of sand.

title: (28280) El Escorial - 85B Calle de Santa Rosa
title_short: (28280) El Escorial - 85B Calle de Santa Rosa
description: Free parking at El Escorial train station.

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - 4 Calle de Camilo José Cela
title_short: (28600) Navalcarnero - 4 Calle de Camilo José Cela
description: A simple parking lot in the middle of the houses. You hear street noise. There are no services, but the place seems safe even if it is absolutely charmless. It's certainly not a place to spend the day, but for an overnight stop if you arrive late, it's fine.

title: (28690) Brunete - 1A Calle Norte
description: Parking under trees. Located next to the Jose Ramon de la Morena sports center. It has shade. It has a source. And it is a quiet area.

title: (28210) La Pizarrera -
description: We spent 2 nights there without being disturbed. Quiet place some hikers and fishermen during the day. Fairly flat place to park a van or motorhome, a small pitch remains in the shade for most of the day (2 vehicles). Access is via a path with a few holes, but it is not inconvenient to access it. A restaurant bar is located around the lake, you can go there by canoe or paddle. We bathed every day, the water is quite clean. Around you can see the mountains, it's very pretty! We went to eat at a restaurant (7min by car) “restaurante casavieja” we eat very well there!

title: (28280) El Escorial - 4I Poligono Sector 1 Ensanche
description: Very quiet urbanized area to spend the night. flat and illuminated surface. Without services

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - 31D Calle de la Estrella
description: Clay parking near the historic center of Navalcarnero and good restaurants.

title: (28690) Brunete - 31 Calle Madrid
description: Quiet street near local police, several parks next door with benches and shade. Supermarket Day next door too. Online parking

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - 10X Paseo del Alparrache
description: Parking of the bullring, quite flat, very central, 5 min to the town square. It has a park next door, 4 restaurants, the medical center opposite, a laundry and a motorhome workshop.

title: (28280) El Escorial - 3E Poligono Sector 1 Ensanche
description:
Cerca de la ciudad de San Lorenzo del escorial.Zona asfaltada sin urbanizar.
Pase una noche en auténtico silencio y con pajaros cantando al amanecer.
Buenas vistas.
Gente paseando por la mañana Muy respetuosa.
Recomiendo.

Park on the outskirts of town.

has shade

description: Quiet place near the hermitage, except for the traffic.

title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 12 Calle Monte Risco Alto

title: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 382 Calle Monte Escorial
title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 382 Calle Monte Escorial
description: Ground parking next to the forest track. Gratuitous. Very close to forest firefighters. Excellent views. Ideal place to start mountain routes in Abantos, both walking and cycling. In general sunny, although it has some shadows. It has no height limitation. To sleep it is super quiet since the asphalted forest track has hardly any traffic and less at night. Fountain and garbage containers one kilometer below.

title: (28270) Madrid -
description: Quiet parking next to the Valmayor Reservoir dam. Good leveling.

title: (05239) Peguerinos - Camino de los Rajuelos
description: La Nava Recreational Area, next to the Campings. Little mobile coverage. Spacious, level, without services, only with fountain and barbecues to use except the summer months. Quiet at night but very popular during the day on weekends. Nice place and with hiking trails.

title: (28691) Villanueva de la Cañada - 3 Avenida Mirasierra
title_short: (28691) Villanueva de la Cañada - 3 Avenida Mirasierra
description: We stayed the night in the large parking lot in the ground located at the entrance to Aquapolis park on the left in yellow on the photo. Free on this part. Opening of the park at 12 p.m. until 8 p.m. Quiet place at night. Be careful to park well so as not to get stuck by other vehicles parked during the day !!!

title: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - Camino del Hospital
title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - Camino del Hospital
description: Recreation area with several parking areas, tables and a restaurant just at the entrance.

title: (45526) Val de Santo Domingo - 403 Carretera Toledo
title_short: (45526) Val de Santo Domingo - 403 Carretera Toledo
description: It is a gas station, and there is a hose to get water for free, and it is also equipped with a wash.

title: (28280) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - M-600
title_short: (28280) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - M-600
description: Picnic area parking. Lots of shade.

name: Camping La Nava
title: (05239) Camping La Nava
description:
Very large campsite with free pitches. Very quiet even on weekends. A few permanent caravans. Friendly welcome. Internet only by wifi at the bar. No network in the campsite.
Much quieter than the Enmedio campsite next door. No swimming pool.

address.street: Carretera de Peguerinos- Alto del León KM 3600

name: Camping Valle Enmedio
title: (05239) Camping Valle Enmedio
description: Valle de enmedio campsite, an excellent place to hike through the Sierra de Guadarrama natural park. spacious pitches, some with some unevenness.

title: (45640) El Real de San Vicente -
description: Parking next to the Piélago Convent. The entrance is down a dirt road in poor condition. Without any kind of service. From here you can do several hiking trails. We spent the night of 09/02/2022 very quiet. It is close to the road but zero noise, I think there is little traffic.

title: (28209) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - Unnamed Road
title_short: (28209) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - Unnamed Road
description: Parking once past the entrance to the Valle de Los Caídos by the bus door, take the direction of the monastery and you will find a very large parking. Only open at the time of the visits.

title: (05120) Navarredondilla - Unnamed Road
description: Parking next to a table area with a fountain. Perfect to rest on route and eat quietly enjoying the views of the Sierra de la Paramera. There is a park for children 50 meters away

title: (05461) Mijares - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area with drinking water and tables, garbage cans and swings. Quiet and shady place.

title: (05461) Mijares - AV-901
description: Small space of land next to the road that goes up to the port of Mijares, in the El Horcajo recreational area, with a fresh water basin that comes down from the mountains (untreated), a recreational area with several tables and benches on both sides of the closed road and barbecues.

title: () Navamorcuende - TO-9045-V
description: In the countryside, recreation area with football field. I highly recommend the climb to the mount and its castle (spectacular views of the Castilian Mancha plateau). and the way to the antennas (gredos see). very quiet area. quite busy on weekends

title: (05461) Mijares - 2 Calle Llanillo Chillon
description: Parking of the natural pool of Mijares, dirt and very uneven. Maybe for one or two vans on the flat at the most. Natural pool of fresh water with bathrooms. Bar right next door. In the same town of Mijares. Area with 3 or 4 tables to eat next to the bar, the pool and the parking lot.

title: (45510) Fuensalida - C Maestro Guerrero
description: Free parking with cameras, ideal to spend a night and buy shoes, is located on the main avenue of the town.

title: (05190) Riofrío -
description: La Raft car park. It is a recently enabled car park to access the Riofrio irrigation pond. It is possible to bathe although you have to be careful with the depth and with diving headfirst because it is deceptive and you do not see the bottom. Access is complicated for motorhomes but small vans climb the slopes for sure. It is not an area that has any services, so you have to be especially careful with cleaning so that access is not prohibited. You can also visit a beautiful waterfall and an abandoned hydroelectric plant that supplied Ávila. It is a parking lot with beautiful views at sunset and a lot of tranquility.

title: (45640) Navamorcuende - TO-9045-V
description: Nice area next to camp el piélago. To get lost in the forest !!

title: (05197) Aldea del Rey Niño - AV-P-405
description: Ample and quiet parking near the town

title_short: (45641) Castillo de Bayuela - 25 Calle Fuente Arriba

title_short: (28209) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - s/n Carretera de Guadarrama
description: Parking to visit the basilica, available during opening hours. you have to pay at the entrance of the site, except Sunday which is free for EU nationals ...
